title: Incorrect Column Alias Display in Expression Builder
description: When setting an alias for columns in a data set, the Expression Builder still displays the old column names when selecting the dataset.
OB: After setting an alias for columns in a data set, the Expression Builder continues to display the original column names when selecting the dataset.
EB: The Expression Builder should display the alias names that were set for the columns in the data set when selecting the dataset.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset.
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the Expression Builder and attempt to select the dataset.
